item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Welcome to Spark Documentation linkWelcome to this comprehensive guide on Apache Spark! Spark is a powerful, open-source unified analytics engine for big data processing, with built-in modules for streaming, SQL, machine learning, and graph processing. This documentation aims to help you understand and utilize Spark effectively for all your big data needs. What You Will Find Here link Comprehensive Guides: Step-by-step tutorials to help you get started and master Spark. API Reference: Detailed descriptions of all functions and methods available in Spark.
